title: Meet The Inkey List Co-Founders Colette Laxton and Mark Curry Live on The Fashionista Network
description: Steph here. I'm so excited to share that I'll be joining Colette Laxton and Mark Curry, co-founders of skin-care brand The Inkey List, on The Fashionista Network. But here's the best part: I want you to join me! It's your opportunity to interact live with us, ask questions and be a part of the ...Continue reading
author: Steph Saltzman
